description: webs in Ruckus Wireless Unleashed through 200.7.10.102.92 allows a remote attacker to cause a denial of service (Segmentation fault) to the webserver via an unauthenticated crafted HTTP request. This affects C110, E510, H320, H510, M510, R320, R310, R500, R510 R600, R610, R710, R720, R750, T300, T301n, T301s, T310c, T310d, T310n, T310s, T610, T710, and T710s devices.
